titleStmt.title: May-day A vvitty comedie, diuers times acted at the Blacke Fryers. VVritten by George Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Browne; dwelling in Fleetstreete in Saint Dunstones Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
